Changing Chart Type

In the chart window of the Windows client, click the Gallery button to change the current chart from one type of display to another. The Gallery button displays the icon for the current chart type. In the Cross-Platform client, click the combobox drop-down arrow, and choose a chart type from the drop-down list.

To display the icons for all available chart types, click on the drop-down arrow. To view your data in a particular type of chart, click the icon for the respective chart type.

To view the name for each type of chart, move the cursor over each chart type icon. The chart name appears at the bottom of the list box.

Windows Client chart types

Chart types for the Windows client include:

  • Area
  • Lines
  • Horizontal Bars
  • Pie
  • Surface
  • Columns
  • Marks
  • Scatter (x vs. y)
  • Doughnut
  • Pareto
  • Cubes
  • Fit-to-Curve
  • (Open-) Hi-Low-Close
  • Polar

For a list of chart types available in the Cross-Platform client see Charting in the Cross-Platform Client.
